title: GIVE US URF PLEASE!!!!!!
body: PLEASE IM GONNA LOSE IT SO HARD ENABLE IT NOW{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Urf will be in the new rotating queue.
It's already being tested on PBE, so it might be coming sooner than we think. You can find more information about it [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue).

~~(Personally I think that rotating gamemode will kickoff with urf on the 4th but nobody knows)~~

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y3PerQgm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-01T09:47:47.511+0000)
>
> Urf will be in the new rotating queue.
> It's already being tested on PBE, so it might be coming sooner than we think. You can find more information about it [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue).
> 
> (Personally I think that rotating gamemode will kickoff with urf on the 4th but nobody knows)

Why would they start on the 4th they have said this game mode will be active during the weekend Friday night to Monday morning so probably next week. if it goes well they said they will expand the window they have set to a longer time.  basically this is the new Treeline queue

totally misread a thing (I forgot Americans date things funny and thought the "party" thing was meant to happen on the 4th).

Completely ignore the last part of what I said :D

I feel like U.R.F. shouldn't be on the rotating game modes, it should be more of a legacy game mode to play.

Even if they just release it once or twice a year, that's fine with the other game modes being on a rotating cycle. 

That's just my personal opinion. But I feel like the game modes will eventually get boring to people, and forgotten about (like what happened with dominion).
Because Rito admitted to not supporting it?

> [{quoted}](name=Gesteppie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y3PerQgm,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2016-04-01T23:40:10.421+0000)
>
> Because Rito admitted to not supporting it?

I thought I read that somewhere, are you able to get a link for me if you can find it?

Thanks buddy!

All fine here is what  L4T3NCY said on a questioner about the new Game Mode 

What times exactly is the queue going to be active? 

We’re aiming to have the queue available every weekend starting around Friday afternoon and switching off sometime early on Monday morning. This will be in the local time for each region. The goal is to have it up once the weekend starts (that’s Friday night right?! :P) so we should get three evenings of fast game mode funtimes. This is just a first implementation, if the queue proves to be exceedingly popular, we can always lengthen the window.

Can you URF fanboys step aside and admire Draven's special day?

All jokes aside, something is catFISHY here. Tahm Kench has a skin for Draven Day, and the skin is called Urf Kench, and it looks a lot like the original urf model. This is very obvious, obviously, but why would they release an Urf skin on April Fools if Urf isn't coming out? I sense something been planned by Draven for April 4th evening...
Because if you read the post on League site, it says Draven is throwing a party on the 4th just so everyone can make it.
isn't that the 1st of the 4th aka today man?
Riot (Draven) said the heads will be up until the 4th of April evening. That is also the times when Riot (Draven's) party commences according to the "It's my party now" post.
Something else I have to point out is go into ward skins and there is Urf Triumphant ward skin
My friend just told me that this ward skin has been in the shop since patch 6.6

> [{quoted}](name=NoxPegasus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y3PerQgm,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-04-02T00:10:11.025+0000)
>
> My friend just told me that this ward skin has been in the shop since patch 6.6

That was from last years URF
Ayyyyyyyyyyyyyyy???? really? I swear it wasn't in the ward skin shop 2 months ago when I went on an rp spending spree and brought like 10 different ward skins or I would have definitely purchased it.
